# <a name="adding-flags-and-reminders-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="30002-102">Dodajanje zastavice in opomniki v Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30002-102">Adding flags and reminders in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30002-103">Lahko določite ali uredite opomnik za dogodek:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30002-103">To set or edit a reminder for an event:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="30002-104">Pojdi na [koledar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30002-104">Go to [Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/calendar/).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="30002-105">Izberite dogodek, ki ga želite biti obveščeni o, nato pa izberite puščice na zgornjem desnem kotu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30002-105">Select the event you want to be reminded about, then select the arrows at the top right corner</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="30002-106">da jo razširite.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30002-106">to expand it.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="30002-107">Poleg **Spomni me**, izberite čas opomnika.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30002-107">Next to **Remind me**, choose a reminder time.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="30002-108">Outlook.com samodejno shrani spremembe.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30002-108"> Outlook.com automatically saves your changes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="30002-109">Opomni, da spremljate sporočila, lahko dodate tudi zastavice:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30002-109">To remind yourself to follow up on a message, you can add a follow-up flag:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="30002-110">Pojdite na [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30002-110">Go to [Mail](https://outlook.live.com/mail/)</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="30002-111">Na seznamu sporočil s kazalcem sporočilo zagledati predkupna pravica zastavo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30002-111">In the message list, hover over the message to see the flag option.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="30002-112">Izberite ikono zastavo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30002-112">Select the flag icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="30002-113">Označi sporočilo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30002-113">to flag the message.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="30002-114">Želite videti vse vaše označena sporočila, izberite kljukico v spodnjem levem kotu strani iti naloge.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30002-114">To see all of your flagged messages, select the check mark at the bottom left corner of the page to go to Tasks.</span></span>
 
<span data-ttu-id="30002-115">Če želite izvedeti več, preberite [zastavo ali pin sporočilo v Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="30002-115">To learn more, read [Flag or pin a message in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/8e911e69-30d6-4cc8-8c71-a1163560618a?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
